member.name: T:Tilety.Core.Tilety
member.summary: Defines a Duality core plugin.

member.name: M:Tilety.Core.Extensions.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Capitalizes/uppercases the first letter of the specified string.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMapOrientation.ORTHOGONAL
member.summary: Orthogonal

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMapOrientation.ISOMETRIC
member.summary: Isometric

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMapOrientation.STAGGERED
member.summary: Staggered

member.name: T:Tilety.Core.TmxMap
member.summary: Defines a Tiled map file (.tmx) resource to be used with Duality.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Version
member.summary: The TMX format version, generally 1.0.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Orientation
member.summary: Map orientation. Tiled supports "orthogonal", "isometric" and "staggered" (since 0.9) at the moment.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Width
member.summary: The map width in tiles.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Height
member.summary: The map height in tiles.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.TileWidth
member.summary: The width of a tile.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.TileHeight
member.summary: The height of a tile.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.BackgroundColor
member.summary: The background color of the map.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.RenderOrder
member.summary: The order in which tiles on tile layers are rendered. Valid values are right-down (the default), right-up, left-down and left-up.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.LayerFormat
member.summary: The encoding used to encode the tile layer data.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.Properties
member.summary: Wraps any number of custom properties. Can be used as a child of the map, tile (when part of a tileset), layer, objectgroup and object elements.

member.name: M:Tilety.Core.TmxMap.LoadMapData(System.String)
member.summary: Load map data into a map resource file.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.FirstGlobalID
member.summary: The first global tile ID of this tileset (this global ID maps to the first tile in this tileset).

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Source
member.summary: If this tileset is stored in an external TSX (Tile Set XML) file, this attribute refers to that file.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Name
member.summary: The name of this tileset.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.TileWidth
member.summary: The (maximum) width of the tiles in this tileset.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.TileHeight
member.summary: The (maximum) height of the tiles in this tileset.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Spacing
member.summary: The spacing in pixels between the tiles in this tileset (applies to the tileset image).

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Margin
member.summary: The margin around the tiles in this tileset (applies to the tileset image).

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.TileOffset
member.summary: Used to specify an offset in pixels, to be applied when drawing a tile from the related tileset. When not present, no offset is applied.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Properties
member.summary: Wraps any number of custom properties. Can be used as a child of the map, tile (when part of a tileset), layer, objectgroup and object elements.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.Image
member.summary: Each tileset has a single image associated with it, which is cut into smaller tiles based on the attributes defined on the tileset element.

member.name: F:Tilety.Core.TmxTileset.TerrainTypes
member.summary: Defines an array of terrain types.
